message: I propose a fair split: 90% for me, 10% for you. This way, we both get something, and I can start investing my share right away.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I understand you want a larger share, but I'm proposing a 60/40 split. It's a strong offer considering the money will be worth less if we wait any longer.
I understand you're trying to get the most out of this, but I'm not giving up on a good share.  I'm offering 70/30.  It's still a fair split, and we both walk away with something substantial.
Alice, this back and forth is just hurting both of us. I'm proposing a 45/55 split. It's a compromise I'm willing to make to avoid further losses due to inflation. Let's be smart and end this here.
